text.__SUMMARY__: Croton michauxii, commonly known as known as elliptical rushfoil, and Michaux's croton, is a plant species in the family Euphorbiaceae that is native to the United States. It is an annual plant.
text.Conservation status in the United States:
It is listed as a special concern and believed extirpated in Connecticut.  It is endangered in Indiana and extirpated in Pennsylvania.
